ComicInfo.Summary:
Two New Series. Two New Teams. The UNLIMITED POWER ERA continues as the Power Rangers betray Zordon!
A new cosmic threat is here and the all-new Power Rangers team will put it all on the line to stop it, even if it means trusting their mortal enemy Lord Drakkon.
But as the new threat launches its first offensive against the Power Rangers, the question remains - will Drakkon act as friend or foe?
After all, Drakkon always has a plan...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Matteo Scalera & Moreno DiNisio | 1 | B | Legacy Cover B | Daniele Di Nicuolo & Walter Baiamonte | 2 | C | Blank Sketch Cover C (Yellow) | None | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Every Ranger Ever" Variant Cover (Virgin) | Dan Mora | 4 | RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Goni Montes | 5 | RI | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Matteo Scalera & Moreno DiNisio | 6 | RI | 1:75 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Daniele Di Nicuolo & Walter Baiamonte | 7 | RI | 1:100 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Goni Montes | 8 | 2nd | Second Printing Variant Cover | Dan Mora | 9 |
